name: Purity Dye
flavorText: This mysterious mixture seems to make any material it is applied to impossible to soil, swirling and coalescing like a perfect white cloud.
flavorTextHtml: This mysterious mixture seems to make any material it is applied to impossible to soil, swirling and coalescing like a perfect white cloud.
description: Changes the color of a single piece of armor.
descriptionHtml: Changes the color of a single piece of armor.
